text: Ivanka Trump visited Pyeongchang for the final weekend to watch the closing ceremony and meet U. S. athletes. Her visit got mixed reviews ; some Olympians took photos with her, while U. S. skier Gus Kenworthy tweeted, ` ` Everybody here has worked so hard to make it to the Olympics and have the opportunity to walk in the closing ceremony! Well … Everyone except Ivanka. Honestly, tf is she doing here?? ”
